pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PropZen CommonCommon modules for PropZen application## Deployment1. Make sure `build` is installed2. Make sure `twine` is installed3. Run `python -m build .`, this should create a `dist/` folder4. Run `python -m twine upload dist/*`5. For `username`, enter `__token__`6. For `password`, enter `<your_pypi_token>`
